item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Oh myy, you have me craving Indian food so badly now! I want cheesy cheesy naan to dip in rich creamy kormas and to sip on thick lassis mmmm and of course some of this pappadum and cucumber mint raita!
item.content:encoded: Oh myy, you have me craving Indian food so badly now! I want cheesy cheesy naan to dip in rich creamy kormas and to sip on thick lassis mmmm and of course some of this pappadum and cucumber mint raita!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Raita is the best for cooling your mouth, and it looks so much nicer with grated cucumber than big chunks. I've microwaved pappadums (the pack said you could) and they turned out fine.
item.content:encoded: Raita is the best for cooling your mouth, and it looks so much nicer with grated cucumber than big chunks. I’ve microwaved pappadums (the pack said you could) and they turned out fine.

item.title: By: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.dc:creator: Alexandra@Chefspiration
item.description: I love raita especially with papadums :) Hmm...should probably go for my banana leaf fix today after looking at your blogpost!
item.content:encoded: I love raita especially with papadums ðŸ™‚ Hmm…should probably go for my banana leaf fix today after looking at your blogpost!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: I love Indian food too and my side order staples are always raita and mango chutney. I can't seem to eat Indian without them! :)
item.content:encoded: I love Indian food too and my side order staples are always raita and mango chutney. I can’t seem to eat Indian without them! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Betty
item.dc:creator: Betty
item.description: Wow. That looks really good & simple to make to! I might just try it! I love Indian food .... looking forward to more posts about Indian feasting :D

item.title: By: Howard
item.dc:creator: Howard
item.description:
I love papadums, they have such an addictive after taste. The dip looks fresh and tasty as well.
Looking forward to your indian desserts. I noticed they have SO many varieties it is insane.
item.content:encoded:
I love papadums, they have such an addictive after taste. The dip looks fresh and tasty as well.

Looking forward to your indian desserts. I noticed they have SO many varieties it is insane.

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Ah i love cucumber raita, there was a time when i used to have only cucumber raita for dinner :)
